org.objectfabric

Interface Session


  • public interface Session
    Server-side request notifications and permission settings.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRequest(URI uri, PermissionCallback callback)
      Request notification, and allows setting a permission on the requested resource.
      Headers sendResponseHeaders()
      Optional, return null if no headers are needed.

    • Method Detail

      • onRequest

        void onRequest(URI uri,
             PermissionCallback callback)
        Request notification, and allows setting a permission on the requested resource. The callback must be invoked for each request with a permission decision. This method is invoked on one of the transport threads and ideally should not block. If a database call or other long running process is required, it should be done asynchronously or in another thread, invoking the callback later when the decision is taken.

      • sendResponseHeaders

        Headers sendResponseHeaders()
        Optional, return null if no headers are needed.
